pid: petunia opera supreme f1 light blue

basic.floral_language:
Petunia x hybrida
Floriography: prudent, intellect, love
Petunia x hybrida are short plants with small trumpet-shaped flowers of many colors, single-petal or multi-petal. Flowering season is long, leaves green, oval. Can be widely used in flower beds or arranged landscapes, window decorations, home decoration and so on, very popular.
Petunia x hybrida is a long-day plant, likes sunshine, shade properly in summer noon, blooms from April to October for 3-4 weeks.
basic.blooming: Flowering period April-October, viewing period 3-4 weeks

display_pid: Petunia Opera Supreme F1 Light Blue

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Long-day plant, put in sunny places
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil is dry, water daily in summer
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly in spring and summer
maintenance.pruning: Remove withered flowers, old, diseased, and dead leaves timely
